title: FEATURES
text: Explore the amazing features of VisuaLit

section.title: Upload and Read Any Format Books
section.content: Users can upload books in various formats (e.g., PDF, EPUB, MOBI) and read them within the app. The system automatically adjusts to different file types and ensures a seamless reading experience across formats.

section.title: AI-Generated Visualizations
section.content: Automatically generates character illustrations, scenes, and visual elements from text descriptions, enhancing the storytelling experience.

section.title: Text-to-Speech Functionality
section.content: Converts text into speech for an immersive reading experience, particularly useful for users with visual impairments or those who prefer audio content.

section.title: Dictionary and Glossary Integration
section.content: Provides real-time definitions for difficult words or phrases, enhancing comprehension and vocabulary building.
